mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PC_REALTIME_TB( PC_CD, USAGE_CPU, TEMP1_CPU, TEMP2_CPU, USAGE_DISK, USAGE_MEM, USAGE_VERT) VALUES( #{pcCode}, #{cpuUsage}, #{cpuTemperature1}, #{cpuTemperature1}, #{diskUsage}, #{memoryUsage}, #{virtualMemoryUsage})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PC_REALTIME_TB WHERE PC_CD = #{pcCode} ORDER BY SEQ DESC
